mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_content(title, img_url, video_url, content, type, view_count, comment_count, create_by,create_time, brief, category_id) VALUES (#{title},#{imgUrl},#{videoUrl},#{content},#{type},0,0,#{createBy},#{createTime},#{brief},#{categoryId})
mapper.select: SELECT con.id, con.title, con.img_url, con.type, con.view_count, con.comment_count, con.create_time, con.brief, cat.name categoryName FROM t_content con JOIN t_category cat ON con.category_id = cat.id WHERE con.type = #{type} AND con.create_by = #{id}
SELECT id, title, img_url, video_url, content, type, create_by, category_id FROM t_content WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT c.id, c.title, c.img_url, u.nick_name, u.img_url userImgUrl, cat.name categoryName FROM t_content c JOIN t_user u ON c.create_by = u.id JOIN t_category cat ON c.category_id = cat.id WHERE c.type = #{type} AND c.category_id = #{categoryId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,4

SELECT c.id, c.title, c.img_url, u.nick_name, u.img_url userImgUrl, cat.name categoryName FROM t_content c JOIN t_user u ON c.create_by = u.id JOIN t_category cat ON c.category_id = cat.id WHERE c.type = #{type} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC

SELECT c.id, c.title, c.video_url, c.content, c.type, c.view_count, c.comment_count, c.create_time, c.brief, u.id userId, u.nick_name, u.img_url userImgUrl FROM t_content c JOIN t_user u ON c.create_by = u.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
SELECT id, title, img_url, create_time FROM t_content WHERE create_by = #{userId} AND id != #{contentId} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 0,4
SELECT id, title, img_url, create_time FROM t_content ORDER BY view_count DESC LIMIT 0,4
